Name: Evil Icebox
About the game: About This Game 'Catch the Flag and Kill the Pink EVIL ICEBOX!' You are Good White Icebox. the others are Bad Iceboxes. there are 8 colors evil icebox! 'EVIL ICEBOX' is simply hard 3D Platformer Action Game and it has simple operation sensitivity. a game that's simple to play but very hard to beat. the game has savepoint per each level. Player can only jump and attack the enemies, but can't kill them (except last boss) and should catch the red flag for go to next level. Just that! But do you have what it takes to beat Level 11 of this Game?! It's Pretty hard. I promise! 'EVIL ICEBOX' features 11 levels, each one getting progressively harder. and every level has hidden route called 'skull road' the route makes the game contents more harder and replayable by your choice! Also some trickery is implemented into the game. and exist many objects like trap! Have Fun! View more detail about the game in Store Page Trailer. Disclaimer MATER Games is not responsible for broken keyboards, broken minds, or broken friendships. Controls Controls are super simple. Move with Left Key & Right Key, Jump with Up key, Attack with Z key. Currently, controllers are partially supported by steam controller settings. Requirements 'EVIL ICEBOX' can work on any Windows computer with working 3D graphics is sufficient. Evil Icebox was exported to support PC and it was tested in Windows 7/8/10 but not tested in Steam OS & Mac & Linux yet.
